title: Classic vanilla sponge cake
ingredients: ['340g (12 oz) caster sugar', '340g (12 oz) Stork® margarine', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '340g (12 oz) self raising flour, sifted', '6 eggs, beaten', '3 tablespoons milk', '125g seedless raspberry jam', 'Buttercream', '280g (10 oz) icing sugar', '150g (5 oz) Stork® margarine', '2 tablespoons milk', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract']
